items.name: accordion
items.title: Accordion
items.description: A collapsible component that displays content in a vertical stack

items.name: alert
items.title: Alert
items.description: A component that displays a brief, important message to the user.

items.name: aspect-ratio
items.title: Aspect Ratio
items.description: Displays content within a desired ratio.

items.name: avatar
items.title: Avatar
items.description: A graphical representation of the user, often used in profile sections.

items.name: badge
items.title: Badge
items.description: A small count and labeling component used to highlight a status.

items.name: button
items.title: Button
items.description: An interactive element used to trigger actions.

items.name: card
items.title: Card
items.description: A container component that displays content in a compact and organized way.

items.name: checkbox
items.title: Checkbox
items.description: A control component that allows for multiple selections within a set.

items.name: input
items.title: Input
items.description: A field that allows user input, often used for forms or search functionality.

items.name: label
items.title: Label
items.description: A text component that provides information about another component.
